item.description:
Kevin Martin, presenter at our FEB meetup, is back with us, this time on the phone. 

Since there is still lots of questions as to how to use Ho’oponopono to clear the path to attract more of what your want, Kevin is so wonderful to make himself available.

"Chime in"...
- with your questions
- to get support & suggestions and
- to share how Ho’oponopono is helping you stay "centered” in forgiveness, gratitude & love more easily, attracting more of what you want.

Thank you very much, Kevin, for your gift of wisdom & time this evening.

WHEN: 9:00 - 10:00 PM EST

WHERE: on the PHONE 

Telephone Bridge Number: 1-218-486-1616 
Access Code: 7928761# 

** Phone # & handout will be sent to you after you RSVP.**

******************************************************
About Kevin Martin:
Website: www.poseffects.com
Contact: kenda_assoc@msn.com, 978-494-4542

Kevin Martin is an author (Perceive This!), speaker, certified hypnotherapist, master practitioner of NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming), & personal development specialist. He has been helping people “help themselves” for many years with his skills in hypnosis, NLP, as well as various other mind-body modalities.

His NLP/Hypnosis instructor & mentor was personally trained by Morrnah Simeona (honored as a "Living Treasure of Hawaii"), who trained Dr. Hew Len. Dr Len then trained Joe Vitale. Kevin is trained in Ho’oponopono & several other Huna techniques. He brings his passion & knowledge to the subject.

Kevin is also the Organizer of the Hypnosis & NLP Meetups in Methuen, Lexington & Natick.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: TELE-Meetup: Mastermind to Clear the Path & Attract More of What You Want
